document.docAuthor: Niu, Ze-Qing, Zhu, Chao-Dong & Kuhlmann, Michael
document.masterDocTitle: Bees of the Colletes clypearis - group (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from China with descriptions of seven new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bees of the Colletes clypearis - group (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from China with descriptions of seven new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Colletes jankowskyi
Radοszkοwski, 1891 -Radοszkοwski 1891 ∶ 253 ; Nοskiewicz 1936 ∶ 448 ; Οsytshnϳuk et al. 1978 ∶ 298 ; Οsytshnϳuk & Rοmankοva 1995 ∶ 484 ; Kuh 1 mann & Dοrn 2002 ∶ 98 ; Ignatenkο 2004 ∶ 109 ; Prοshcha 1 ykin 2004 ∶ 3 ; 2007 b∶ 879 ; Quest 2009 ∶ 121 ; Prοshcha 1 ykin & Quest 2009 ∶ 239 ; Kuh 1 mann 2009 a∶ 18 ; Kuh 1 mann 2009 b∶ 29 ; Kuh 1 mann & Prοshcha 1 ykin 2011 ∶ 17 .

Colletes ventralis Perez, 1903
-Perez 1903 ∶ 225 . Synοnymized by Kuh 1 mann 2000 ∶ 180 .

Colletes ventraliformis
Cοckere11, 1924-Cοckere 11 1924 ∶ 595 . Synοnymized by Kuh 1 mann 2000 ∶ 180 .

Distribution in China .
Beijing, Hebei, Shanxi, Shandong, Gansu, Inner Mongolia , Jilin, Heilongjiang, Yunnan (
Fig. 31
k).
General distribution. Russia , Tajikistan , Mongolia , China .
